title: (Game Engine) Visual RPG Studio v2.0.29
description:
Want to make your own games?
LastEnd Visual RPG Studio (VRS) gives you the power to create your own game without any special knowledge or training. All you need is a computer, an imagination, and you are on the way to making your own game. This 2D / 3D game engine and editor for Windows can support many types of games; not just RPG (Role Playing Games) because of its open project templates scripted in Visual Lua. 


Core Features 
 -Custom Collision
 -Visual Lua Scripting
 -Supports Xbox 360 Controller
 -Premade Custom Interfaces
 -Customizable Workspace
 -Project Templates
 -Easy Multilingual Deployment
 -Encrypted Resources
 -Auto Updater
 -User Interface Editor

2D Features
 -Large Maps
 -1 to 10 Layers
 -Unlimited Tile-sets
 -Unlimited Animated Tiles
 -Built-in Animation Tools

3D Features
 -Large Maps
 -Dynamic Shadows
 -Blended Terrain
